mutants.code:
def max_beauty(N, A, B):
    ratios = [(i, B[i] / A[i]) for i in range(N)]
    ratios.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
    max_beauty_value = 1
    current_position = 0
    for i in range(N):
        index = ratios[i][0]
        max_beauty_value += B[index] * current_position
        current_position += A[index]
    return max_beauty_value

    for i in range(N):

        max_beauty_value += B[index] * current_position
        current_position += A[index]
    return max_beauty_value
